info.name: AI Interview System API
info.description: This collection contains all the API endpoints for the AI Interview System MVP. It allows for managing users, CVs, and interviews.

request.description:
Checks the operational status of the API.

**Returns:**
- `200 OK` with `{"status": "ok"}` if the service is running.

Returns a welcome message from the API.

**Returns:**
- `200 OK` with a welcome message.

Registers a new user in the system.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): The unique email address for the user.
- `name` (string, optional): The name of the user.

**Returns:**
- `200 OK`: The created user object, including their database-generated `id`.

Uploads a new CV for an existing user.

**Prerequisites:** You must have a valid `user_id` from a previously created user.

**Request Body:**
- `user_id` (integer, required): The ID of the user who owns this CV.
- `raw_text` (string, required): The full text content of the CV.

**Returns:**
- `200 OK`: The created CV object.
- `400 Bad Request`: If the `user_id` does not exist.

response.name: Create CV
response.body:
{
    "id": 3,
    "user_id": 3,
    "raw_text": " 
Hassan Khaled Khamis 
hassan9khaled@gmail.com| +201273604829 | Al-Amiriya, Cairo, Egypt 
LinkedIn: hassan9khaled | GitHub: hassan9khaled 
 
PROFILE 
 
A Data Science student at the Helwan University with Strong academic achievement Possess strong 
leadership and communication skills and problem-solving skills with fluency in Arabic and good 
spoken English Keen to pursue a career in Data Science. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Helwan University | Cairo, Egypt                                                                       Oct 2021 – June 2025 
Bachelor in Statistics and Computer Science 
. 
 
Work Experience  
 
● Data Entry at Majorel (1 month) – Katameya 
● Data Entry at MEEG (6 months) – Nasr City 
 
Projects 
 
Email Classifier: 
Developed a machine learning model to automatically categorize emails into predefined 
labels using Bayes Theorem 
Sentiment Analysis (NLTK, scikit-learn): 
Built a natural language processing tool to determine the emotional tone (positive, 
negative, neutral) of text data. 
Gold Price Prediction: 
Created a predictive model to forecast future gold prices based on historical data and 
relevant features using Time Series Techniques. 
RAG System: 
Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for ingesting, chunking, and 
embedding PDF documents using LangChain and Chroma, with features for efficient content 
management and database persistence 
Diet recommendation system(K-means): 
Designed a system that provides personalized diet recommendations based on user 
preferences and health goals using clustering. 
AI-Agent: 
Developed an intelligent agent capable of performing autonomous tasks and interacting 
with its environment 
 
 
 
 
Courses 
 
- 
Mastering Python (Elzero Web School) via YouTube 
- 
Machine Learning Course (Andrew NG) via Coursera  
Skills 
 
Languages: Arabic (native), English (B1) 
Microsoft Office: Proficient in Word, Excel and PowerPoint 
Skill: Data Entry, Python development, Touch typing, Content Writing, Problem Solving, Web 
scraping 
 
",
    "file_path": "/media/hassan/Programming/Python/ai-interview-system/backend/app/assets/cvs/3/zgin71tjci6w_HassanKhaledCV.pdf",
    "uploaded_at": "2025-09-25T12:39:13"
}

request.description:
Creates a new interview session for a user based on one of their CVs.

**Prerequisites:** You must have a valid `user_id` and a `cv_id` that belongs to that user.

**Request Body:**
- `user_id` (integer, required): The ID of the user.
- `cv_id` (integer, required): The ID of the CV to be used for the interview.
- `job_title` (string, required): The target job title for this interview.

**Returns:**
- `200 OK`: The created interview object, including a `score` and `decision`.
- `400 Bad Request`: If the `user_id` or `cv_id` is not found or mismatched.
